title-group.article-title: Regularization of Ill-Posed Problems by Envelope Guided Conjugate Gradients

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 1997 American Statistical Association, Institute of Mathematical Statistics, and Interface Foundation of North America

abstract.p: We propose a new way to iteratively solve large scale ill-posed problems by exploiting the relation between Tikhonov regularization and multiobjective optimization to obtain, iteratively, approximations to the Tikhonov L-curve and its corner. Monitoring the change of the approximate L-curves allows us to adjust the regularization parameter adaptively during a preconditioned conjugate gradient iteration, so that the desired solution can be reconstructed with a low number of iterations. We apply the technique to an idealized image reconstruction problem in positron emission tomography.
